Package reskue.task

Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
kueres.base.BaseController<E,​R,​S>
reskue.ReskueController<TaskEntity,​TaskRepository,​TaskService>
reskue.task.TaskController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/task")
public class TaskController
extends ReskueController<TaskEntity,​TaskRepository,​TaskService>
The TaskController provides API functions for TaskEntities. These functions are: - all functions of the BaseController in kueres.base - all functions of the ReskueController in reskue - finding all subtasks of a task - finding all users that are helping on a task - changing the state of a task - adding a user to the helpers of a task - removing a user from the helpers of a task
Since:
Mar 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Strassburg, jan.strassburg@student.kit.edu

      @PostMapping("/autoContact") @RolesAllowed("administrator") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskEntity> createAutoContact​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException, java.io.IOException

    • getAllComments

      @GetMapping("/{id}/comments") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CommentEntity> getAllComments​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all comments of the task. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      See kueres.query.SortBuilder for sort syntax.

      Parameters:
      id - - the task's identifier.
      filter - - the filter options.
      sort - - the sort options.
      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.
